bibl.title: Parmenides in the Derveni Papyrus: New Images for a New Edition.
bibl.note: Early versions of this article were presented at the University of Michigan in October 2014 and at the Annual Meeting of the Society for Classical Studies on 11 January 2015. - 1. The need for further work on the papyrus. - 2. Technologies old and new for reading the papyrus. - 3. Bibliological results. - 4. The interpretation of the Orphic poem. - 5. The opening columns.
bibl.seg: Richard Janko, Parmenides in the Derveni Papyrus: New Images for a New Edition.

Early versions of this article were presented at the University of Michigan in October 2014 and at the Annual Meeting of the Society for Classical Studies on 11 January 2015. - 1. The need for further work on the papyrus. - 2. Technologies old and new for reading the papyrus. - 3. Bibliological results. - 4. The interpretation of the Orphic poem. - 5. The opening columns.
